title: Love Island’s Belle Hassan bares her bottom in PVC bodysuit for saucy photoshoot
text:

Belle Hassan, 21, is sure to have sent pulses racing with her latest saucy Instagram upload.

The Love Island beauty gave fans a glimpse of her peachy bottom as she slipped into a black PVC bodysuit for a sizzling photoshoot on Friday.

Looking every inch the siren, the bombshell can be seen in the image seductively peering over her shoulder as she posed side-on.

Belle was preened to perfection for the glamorous shoot with a face of expertly applied make-up and her long golden extensions were styled in loose curls.

The reality TV star captioned the sexy snap: "HAPPY FRIDAY B****HH."

The offering comes after she revealed that she is closer than ever with ex Anton Danyluk after their split.

The Love Island stars were firm fan favourites on the show and left people devastated when they split just a few weeks after leaving the villa.

But Belle recently told that they’re now closer than ever and she won’t rule out a reunion.

Speaking to Mirror Online at the Mirror’s Animal Hero Awards, she said: “Do you know what, we still speak all the time, we’re still really close. I think we’re closer now than we’ve ever been before.

(Image: Matt Frost/ITV/REX)

“So you know we’ll just see. We’re good friends so if something comes of it, something comes of it, if it doesn’t then we’ll be good friends.”

She added: “It’s not that we didn’t get on, or like we fell out, it’s just that he’s at one end of the country and I’m at the other.

“It is what is is, but you never know.”

Belle, who is the daughter of hardman actor Tamer Hassan, also shared that she’s been very busy since leaving the villa and has lots of exciting things coming up, including working on original music.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: PA)

She said: “Life has been crazy, it’s mad, I’ve been here, there and everywhere and all over the place but I love it.”

She added: “I’m in the recording studio, I think next month and I’m really looking forward to it.

“Bit of singing, bit of that.”

And of course, Belle reckons her dad will make a cameo in her music video.

She laughed: “Oh of course he f***ing will. I can’t get rid of him!

“He’s everywhere, he’s my biggest fan isn’t he? So whatever I do he’s always going to have a little bit in it.”
description: The reality TV star flaunted her peachy posterior in the cheeky image she shared online
